short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension allows you to assign nick names to your credit cards on Amazon - Now for any country - And includes Smile!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension gives you a quick interface to assign nicknames to your credit cards and checking accounts on Amazon then surfaces them on the manage payment and checkout pages. Amazon domains have been updated, a few bugs have been fixed, and added a footer to get help.
